name: Maximilien Adventure
description:
The game can be played through the browser but for a better experience, the desktop version is the one to choose!

Source code available right here

A super Mario like created for for the fifth birthday of my nephew Maximilien.

Since it's gonna be his first video game, the gameplay focus on simplicity. Levels are shorts and permissives. Maximilien adventure is short experience, it can be finish in less than an hour. 

Maximilien Adventure is available in English and French. 

Preface

Maximilien, a young adventure, survive a terrible plane crash. With the help of some locals, he will needs to get through the jungle and find his brother and sister.

The game has 19 unique levels with one unique boss.

Language

Maximilien Adventure is available in French and English. The default setting set the language  to french (since my nephew only speaks french). You can  change the localization  in the option menu.

Keybindings

  •  Move - WASD or arrow keys
  •  Jump - Space /
  • Run - Shift
  • Interaction - F
  • Pause - Escape

The game is compatible with Xbox controller (also Joycon and playstation controller but it you play with them, you will get the Xbox Input props).
